By the King. A proclamation for preuenting the decayes of churches and chappels for the time to come. England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
[2] p.
by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie, Imprinted at London : M. DC. XXIX. [1629]
Dated at end: Hampton Court, the eleuenth day of October, in the fift yeere of His reigne .. Arms 24; Steele notation: taken Churches 2) a- and. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
